SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTN_QA_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM028') B ON A.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = B.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND A.TRGET_ID = #{trgetId}
AND A.WRTER_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND A.QESTN_SJ LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT C.QA_ID , C.QESTN_SJ , C.QESTN_CN , C.WRITNG_PASSWORD , C.AREA_NO , C.MIDDLE_TELNO , C.END_TELNO , C.EMAIL_ADRES , C.EMAIL_ANSWER_AT , C.WRTER_NM , C.WRITNG_DE , C.ANSWER_CN , C.ANSWER_DE , C.RDCNT AS "inqireCo" , C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , D.CODE_NM AS "qnaProcessSttusCodeNm" , A.USER_NM AS "emplyrNm" , A.OFFM_TELNO , A.EMAIL_ADRES AS "aemailAdres" , B.ORGNZT_NM , C.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , C.FRST_REGISTER_ID , C.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" , C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTN_QA_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM028') D ON C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = D.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO A ON A.ESNTL_ID= C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_ORGNZT_INFO B ON A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID WHERE QA_ID = #{qaId}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTN_QA_INFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM028') B ON A.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = B.CODE WHERE 1=1
AND A.TRGET_ID = #{trgetId}
AND A.WRTER_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'
AND B.CODE_NM LIKE '%'|| #{searchKeyword} ||'%'

SELECT C.QA_ID , C.QESTN_SJ , C.QESTN_CN , C.WRITNG_PASSWORD , C.AREA_NO , C.MIDDLE_TELNO , C.END_TELNO , C.EMAIL_ADRES , C.EMAIL_ANSWER_AT , C.WRTER_NM , C.WRITNG_DE , C.ANSWER_CN , C.ANSWER_DE , C.RDCNT AS "inqireCo" , C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE , D.CODE_NM AS "qnaProcessSttusCodeNm" , A.USER_NM AS "emplyrNm" , A.OFFM_TELNO , A.EMAIL_ADRES AS "aemailAdres" , B.ORGNZT_NM , C.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm" , C.FRST_REGISTER_ID , C.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM AS "lastUpdusrPnttm" , C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM COMTN_QA_INFO C LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CODE, CODE_NM FROM COMTC_CMMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM028') D ON C.QNA_PROCESS_STTUS_CODE = D.CODE LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_EMPLYR_INFO A ON A.ESNTL_ID= C.LAST_UPDUSR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTN_ORGNZT_INFO B ON A.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID WHERE QA_ID = #{qaId}
